title: Property function for EnsureTrailingSlash()
body:
There's a condition expression `HasTrailingSlash()` that is almost always used as if-not-has-trailing-slash, add slash.

This could be easier with something like

```xml
<PathProperty>$([MSBuild]::EnsureTrailingSlash('$(PathProperty)')</PathProperty>
```

(Which has the added bonus of being easily cross-platform.)
